snippet: “The Classical Style,” an opera buffa performed Thursday at Zankel Hall, casts chords as characters along with Beethoven, Haydn and Mozart in a playful riff on harmony.
abstract: Anthony Tommasini reviews The Classical Style: An Opera (of Sorts), with music by Steven Stucky and libretto by pianist Jeremy Denk at Zankel Hall.
